data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Borana Weaves Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from May 27 2025 the equity shares of Borana Weaves Ltd (Scrip Code: 544404) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250526- dated May 26 2025.
